QuestData.Title: A Walk With the Spirits
QuestData.Description: The spiritwalker you saved from Riverbend has been insufferable since his arrival. He is insisting on showing you the ways of our people so that you better understand what is to come.$b$bHe is a strange one, even by spiritwalker standards.$b$bEven so, only a fool would discard his insight. Please, go to speak with him when you get a moment.
QuestData.RewardText: You made Mayla smile. That is the first time I have seen her smile in... ever?
